channel.title: Noted Items
channel.description: Having some trouble making some items noteable with the bank with PI. For example, Dragon Claws. Their unnoted id is 14484 and noted is 14485, but when i try to withdraw them as a note, it says this item can't be noted. And, if I spawn some noted claws, I bank them and they are still a note, and when I withdraw, they're still a note. What do I do? Can't find this anywhere, even tried google.

item.title: Noted Items
item.dc:creator: @Owner_satan Owner satan
item.description:
@Owner_satan wrote:

Having some trouble making some items noteable with the bank with PI. For example, Dragon Claws. Their unnoted id is 14484 and noted is 14485, but when i try to withdraw them as a note, it says this item can’t be noted. And, if I spawn some noted claws, I bank them and they are still a note, and when I withdraw, they’re still a note. What do I do? Can’t find this anywhere, even tried google.

Read full topic
